nodes.text: Majestic was an Imperial I-class Star Destroyer that served as Emperor Palpatine's private flagship in the months following the Battle of Hoth.
At some point after the Clone Wars, it was built over Kuat at Kuat Drive Yards.
A couple of months before the Battle of Endor, Grand Admiral Zaarin managed to intercept and damage this vessel with the Emperor aboard in an attempted coup of the Empire.

Had it not been for the timely arrival of Darth Vader and then-Vice Admiral Thrawn aboard the Star Destroyer Vanguard, it is quite likely both the Emperor and Majestic would have fallen into Zaarin's hands.
